paper_abstract: We consider a recently introduced triangular nonconforming finite element of third-order accuracy in the energy norm called P-3(mod) element. We show that this finite element is appropriate for approximating the velocity in incompressible flow problems since it satisfies an inf-sup condition for discontinuous piecewise quadratic pressures.
paper_title: On the inf-sup condition for the P-3(mod)/P-2(disc) element
